title: GTA Online: San Andreas Mercenaries
headline: GTA Online: San Andreas Mercenaries
subtitle: Watch the Trailer on the Rockstar Newswire
content:
It’s payback time… See Merryweather Security and their corrupt killers for hire get what's coming to them in the explosive new trailer for GTA Online: San Andreas Mercenaries.

Head to the Rockstar Newswire to watch the trailer and find out more about GTA Online: San Andreas Mercenaries - coming June 13.
